param.name: TailPV
param.label: Tail PV
param.description: PV for Tail, Enter 0 for No Tail Systems

param.name: LeftFields
param.label: Left Fields
param.description: Comma Seperated Fields to be sum as Left Field

param.name: RightFields
param.label: Right Fields
param.description: Comma Seperated Fields to be sum as Right Field

param.name: TailRP
param.label: Tail RP
param.description: RP for Tail, Enter 0 for No Tail Systems, Only Afacted if set RP as binary system in config paramter

param.name: RPCapping
param.label: RP Capping
param.description: Capping for RP Binary, Only Afacted if set RP as binary system in config paramter

param.name: BinaryShareToIntro
param.label: Binary Share To Introducer in %
param.description: If Introducer shares certain percentage of Binary Income of his Introducee then give that percentage here or leave/0 to deactivate this binary Income
